name: server
description: Backend server for the Drawer Organizer application

scripts.kill-port: lsof -ti :3000 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No process found on port 3000'
scripts.check-all-ports: echo 'Checking client port 5173:' && (lsof -i :5173 || echo 'Available') && echo 'Checking server port 3000:' && (lsof -i :3000 || echo 'Available')
